<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.RestrictStateForP1</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>RestrictStateForP1</name><script><![CDATA[var RestrictStateForP1 = RestrictStateForP1lass.create();
RestrictStateForP1.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        var cnt = 0;
        var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
        gr.addQuery('category', this.getParameter("sysparm_category"));
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
		cnt ++;
        }
		return cnt;
    },



    type: 'RestrictStateForP1'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-06 09:42:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>9e3000991b6cd1109feaece4604bcb62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RestrictStateForP1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9e3000991b6cd1109feaece4604bcb62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-06 14:11:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
